statements: SELECT * FROM performance_scorecards WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_scorecards WHERE metric_value > 80;
SELECT id, entry_date FROM performance_scorecards WHERE entry_date = '2022-01-12';
SELECT * FROM performance_scorecards ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT department_id, AVG(metric_value) AS average_score FROM performance_scorecards GROUP BY department_id;
SELECT department_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_scorecards WHERE metric_value > 50 ORDER BY entry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_scorecards WHERE department_id = 2 AND entry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT MAX(metric_value) AS max_value, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value, COUNT(*) AS total_entries FROM performance_scorecards WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT department_id, COUNT(*) AS total_metrics FROM performance_scorecards GROUP BY department_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_metrics DESC;
SELECT SUM(metric_value) AS total_value, MIN(entry_date) AS earliest_date FROM performance_scorecards WHERE entry_date > '2021-07-01';
SELECT * FROM performance_scorecards WHERE metric_name = 'Productivity';
SELECT id, metric_name FROM performance_scorecards ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_scorecards WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value ASC;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_scorecards WHERE metric_name LIKE '%Sales%' AND metric_value BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT vp.id, pr.metric_name, vp.image_url FROM performance_scorecards AS pr JOIN visual_representations AS vp ON pr.id = vp.scorecard_id;
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_scorecards WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_name DESC
SELECT scorecard_id, image_url FROM visual_representations WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY image_url ASC
SELECT * FROM performance_scorecards WHERE metric_name LIKE '%sales%'
SELECT id, metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_scorecards WHERE metric_value < 50 ORDER BY metric_value DESC
SELECT scorecard_id, COUNT(*) FROM visual_representations GROUP BY scorecard_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM performance_scorecards
SELECT user_id, performance_metric, value FROM performance_scorecards ORDER BY date_recorded DESC
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin'
SELECT * FROM metrics WHERE metric_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT user_id, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM performance_scorecards GROUP BY user_id
SELECT * FROM performance_scorecards WHERE value > 50 ORDER BY date_recorded ASC
SELECT user_id, performance_metric FROM performance_scorecards WHERE user_id = 101 AND performance_metric = 'Productivity' ORDER BY date_recorded DESC

SELECT users.name, metrics.metric_name FROM users INNER JOIN performance_scorecards ON performance_scorecards.user_id = users.user_id INNER JOIN metrics ON performance_scorecards.performance_metric = metrics.metric_name
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value, MIN(value) AS min_value, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM performance_scorecards WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'

SELECT users.name, metrics.metric_name, performance_scorecards.value FROM users LEFT JOIN performance_scorecards ON users.user_id = performance_scorecards.user_id AND performance_scorecards.value IS NOT NULL ORDER BY users.name
SELECT * FROM performance_scorecards;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_scorecards WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT representation_name, representation_type FROM visual_representations ORDER BY representation_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS average_value FROM performance_scorecards;

SELECT PS.scorecard_id, PM.metric_name, PD.value FROM performance_scorecards AS PS LEFT JOIN performance_data AS PD ON PS.scorecard_id = PD.scorecard_id LEFT JOIN performance_metrics AS PM ON PD.metric_id = PM.metric_id;
SELECT * FROM performance_scorecards WHERE metric_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT representation_type, COUNT(*) FROM visual_representations GROUP BY representation_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT pd.value, pm.metric_name FROM performance_data pd JOIN performance_metrics pm ON pd.metric_id = pm.metric_id WHERE pd.data_id <= 100 ORDER BY pd.data_id ASC;

SELECT ps.scorecard_id, ps.metric_name, pd.value FROM performance_scorecards ps JOIN performance_data pd ON ps.scorecard_id = pd.scorecard_id WHERE metric_name = 'Conversion Rate' ORDER BY pd.value DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_scorecards WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM performance_scorecards;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, date_measured FROM performance_scorecards WHERE id = 1;
SELECT emp_name, emp_role FROM employees WHERE emp_dept_id = 2 ORDER BY emp_name DESC;
SELECT dept_name, manager_name FROM departments WHERE dept_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT metric_type, metric_description FROM metrics WHERE metric_id < 5 ORDER BY metric_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_scorecards WHERE metric_name = 'Productivity' ORDER BY date_measured DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT emp_id, emp_name, emp_role FROM employees WHERE emp_dept_id = 2 ORDER BY emp_name ASC;
SELECT metric_description FROM metrics WHERE metric_type = 'Financial' LIMIT 10;
SELECT dept_name, manager_name FROM departments ORDER BY manager_name DESC, dept_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM metric_history WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
